headline: Citi starts Cadence and Synopsys at Buy as EDA industry enters new growth cycle
summary: Investing.com -- Citi has initiated coverage of the Electronic Design Automation (EDA) sector with Buy ratings on Cadence and Synopsys, arguing that the industry is entering a new phase of growth as artificial intelligence pushes chip design deeper into the physical world.

content.title: Citi starts Cadence and Synopsys at Buy as EDA industry enters new growth cycle
content.summary: Investing.com -- Citi has initiated coverage of the Electronic Design Automation (EDA) sector with Buy ratings on Cadence and Synopsys, arguing that the industry is entering a new phase of growth as artificial intelligence pushes chip design deeper into the physical world.
